User should see the response status code 200
The response header should contain "Content-Type" with "application/json"
The response should contain a list of foods with ids ["1", "2", "3", "4"]
The food names should include ["cucumber salad", "french fries", "soft drink", "burgers"]
The API base URL is set to "http://localhost:3000"
